name: Raining Stars (thesaucymind)
description:
This is my first game made in Unity using C# programming language.

This game is all about surviving the longest distance (measured in au - astronomical unit) whilst shooting down asteroids of different sizes as much as you can.

All the assets of the game was made by myself except for the space background and gameplay music.

Gameplay music were from:

Voice of Eternity - Inspiring Space Hybrid : https://soundcloud.com/keysofmoon/voice-of-eternity-hybrid-space-music-free-down...

Infraction - Scammer : https://open.spotify.com/track/3rIpAC9VzVpLM5TkaLYQIc?si=93e58c61e8f4415a

It is my first complete game.
